lead_paragraph: Carlos Villaneuva bent a free kick over a defensive wall and into the upper corner of the net for a tie-breaking goal in the 87th minute, giving Chile a 3-2 victory against Ecuador last night in the first round of the Copa America.Chile rallied from deficits twice, with Humberto Suazo scoring in the 21st and 80th minutes. Ecuador, knocked out of last year’s World Cup in the second round by England, got goals from Antonio Valencia in the 16th minute and Segundo Castillo in the 23rd.
